players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I am the Mafioso and I killed Charlie last night. Stay vigilant, as there is still a traitor among us."
Bob: "Let's discuss the possibility of there being a Mafioso among us. We need to figure out who it is and why they killed Charlie."
Diana: "Charlie, I think Alice is the Mafioso. We should lynch them tonight."
